title: Harris is borrowing from 'Republican playbook' as she leads Trump in new national poll
content: Pollster Frank Luntz cited a new poll showing Kamala Harris leading Donald Trump for the first time since Joe Biden dropped out of the presidential race.
summary: Pollster Frank Luntz cited a new poll showing Kamala Harris leading Donald Trump for the first time since Joe Biden dropped out of the presidential race.

title: GM expects 2025 earnings to be similar to this year despite industry headwinds
content: The Detroit automaker's targeted adjusted earnings before interest and taxes this year is between $13 billion and $15 billion, or $9.50 and $10.50.
summary: The Detroit automaker's targeted adjusted earnings before interest and taxes this year is between $13 billion and $15 billion, or $9.50 and $10.50.

title: Russia is on a 'sustained mission' to create mayhem on Europe's streets, UK spy chief says

title: States sue TikTok over app's effects on kids' mental health

title: Apple could launch a ring to rival Samsung by 2026, research firm predicts

title: This 42-year-old built a $2 billion a year super app called Grab: I worked '20 hour' days
content: Anthony Tan, 42, is the co-founder and CEO of Grab. As of 2023, the company serves 35 million customers and provides 13 million gig jobs across Southeast Asia.
summary: Anthony Tan, 42, is the co-founder and CEO of Grab. As of 2023, the company serves 35 million customers and provides 13 million gig jobs across Southeast Asia.
